Commerce deals with an activity of buying and selling of goods and services. It includes all the processes, rules and technologies involved in exchange of products. It is a study of important aspects of commercial world

patterns: what can i do after class 12?

patterns: what kind of competetive exams are there for class 12 student?
responses: some popular exams are IIT,NEET,BITSAT,AIMCAT etc

As the level of competition is very high in NEET, you need to be well-prepared in order to get a seat in one of the top medical colleges in the country. If you haven't studied properly in your Class 11, it is high time you pull up your socks and start your NEET preparation.

Spend more time on areas that you're weak in. To get a hold of the concept, practice regularly and stay updated.  Do not skip any topic that you feel is not up to your task or is unnecessary. Make short notes of formulas, concepts, pointers and important chapters.Self-evaluate regularly as per your comfort.
